Title: Gaston Lagaffe
Writer: Pierre-François Martin-Laval (scenario and adaptation), Mathias Gavarry (scenario and adaptation), André Franquin (characters)
Actors: Théo Fernandez, Pierre-François Martin-Laval, Arnaud Ducret, Jérôme Commandeur
Plot: Gaston gets hired as an intern. With its wacky inventions he puts the daily life of his colleague's on stilts. Our brilliant hobbyist experience crazy adventures with a cat, a gull, a cow and the Flat Vid Phone.
